Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Sgt. Townsend  Officer Context: Sgt. Townsend was instructed to process a scene for latent prints and physical evidence. He complied and took charge of a residence, supervising personnel in a scene search. He also lifted several latents from the residence. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Detectives Gebbia  Officer Context: Detectives Gebbia arrived at a radio station with Detective Venezia. They later requested that Sgt. Pat Boche supervise crime lab processing. The detectives also conducted a canvass of an area. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Venezia  Officer Context: Detective Venezia arrived at a radio station with Detectives Gebbia, was involved in various activities throughout the narrative, like arriving at a scene, interviewing individuals, processing evidence, and more. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sergeant Ruiz  Officer Context: Sgt. Ruiz had an attorney arrive in his office at one point. He also instructed personnel, interviewed individuals, and made decisions regarding the investigation.
